definition: form of a Chinese character/variant of 字型[zi4 xing2]
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
shape resembling the character 八 or 8/V-shape/splayed/figure of eight
Chinese character input method for entering characters by numbered strokes/variant of 五筆字型|五笔字型[wu3 bi3 zi4 xing2]

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .
sentences.chinese: 用火焰切割器在包裝上切開一個十字形切口。

sentences.english: By use of stagger arrangement, the detector array has 100% fill-factor.
sentences.chinese: 器件採用品字形排列，佔空比爲100%。

sentences.english: Forged module, "H"type section, two fist-end type, drum braking.
sentences.chinese: 鍛壓成型，工字形斷面，兩端拳式，鼓式制動器。

sentences.english: In the foyer, herringbone hardwood floors with a walnut border were installed.
sentences.chinese: 在門廳裏，人字形硬木地板與核桃邊境被安裝。

sentences.english: It was just impossible for him to get into this I-shaped hole.
sentences.chinese: 要他鑽進這個“工”字形的洞口，是完全不可能的。

sentences.english: Ligature glyph widths are divided evenly among the characters they represent.
sentences.chinese: 連字字形寬度以它們代表的字符均勻的劃分。

sentences.english: There were classical shaped concrete handrails along zig-zag running terrace – strongest element.
sentences.chinese: 沿着之字形平臺的經典混凝土扶手是最強有力的元素。

sentences.english: The lightning zigzagged through the church yard.
sentences.chinese: 閃電呈之字形劃過教堂的院子。

sentences.english: Facial hair can be fashionable, but it's probably best for men not to rock the ZZ Top look.
sentences.chinese: 鬍子會很時尚，但是男人最好不要留Z字形鬍鬚。

sentences.english: Sunbathers lay spread-eagled on the grass.

sentences.chinese: 他們在大西洋中作之字形前進。

sentences.english: Scutica consisting of 3 pairs of kinetosomes, arranged in "Y"-shape.
sentences.chinese: 盾片由3對毛基粒彼此緊靠而成“Y”字形排布。

sentences.english: The pipe correction structure is shaped like C from the side view.
sentences.chinese: 所述的管正結構從側面看形似“C”字形。

sentences.english: Count of glyphs in the glyph buffer.
sentences.chinese: 在字形緩衝區中的字形數量。

sentences.english: Count of glyphs in the glyph buffer.
sentences.chinese: 在字形緩衝區中的字形數量。

sentences.english: Vivid display of the evolution of Chinese characters from pictograms to modern versions helps you understand and retain Chinese characters easily.
sentences.chinese: 形象的漢字字形演變軌跡，幫助你理解和記憶漢字。

definition: shape resembling the character 八 or 8/V-shape/splayed/figure of eight
pictogram/one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters/Chinese character derived from a picture/sometimes called hieroglyph
seal script used throughout the pre-Han period
pictogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character derived from a picture/sometimes called hieroglyph
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 13), occurring in 用, 同, 网 etc/see also 同字框[tong2 zi4 kuang4]
